title: Kohl’s Shares Surge 30% on Takeover Bids for Retailer
sub_head: Starboard and Sycamore have made separate approaches for department-store chain, people familiar say
body:
Kohl’s Corp. shares soared 30% Monday morning after the department-store chain confirmed multiple suitors are circling it.
Kohl’s confirmed that it received letters expressing interest in acquiring the company and said its board would review them. Kohl’s shares jumped nearly $15 to $61.47 in early trading.
